outputs.output_descr: This project will achieve: (1) Existing systems/policies/standards/ guidelines are enhanced/ new ones are established; (2) institutional and technical capacities on EEL applications developed; (3) consumer awareness on EEL applications improved; (4) EEL initiatives financing assistance program implemented; (5) management and disposal of mercury congaing lamp waste are environmentally acceptable.

project_descr: Philippine Efficient Lighting Market Transformation Project (PELMATP)
project_title: Phil Efficient Lighting Market Transformation Project
